site.title: AlgoRhythmics
site.description: AI innovation lab building NodeVoyage travel platform and Ideonautix productivity suite

hero.status: In Development • Shaping the Future of AI
hero.title: Where Logic Dances with Creativity
hero.subtitle: Building NodeVoyage travel platform and Ideonautix productivity suite with cutting-edge AI technology

story.title: Our Story
story.reality_text: We're creating AI-powered platforms that transform how people travel and work. NodeVoyage reimagines travel planning with intelligent assistance, while Ideonautix empowers startups with modular productivity tools.
story.mission_text: To democratize AI technology by building accessible, intelligent platforms that solve real problems for travelers and entrepreneurs worldwide.
story.vision_text: A future where AI seamlessly enhances human creativity and productivity, making complex tasks effortless and opening new possibilities for innovation.

founders.title: Meet the Founders
founders.subtitle: Building the future of AI together

nikita.position: Head of Brand Strategy & Product Innovation at Reclame Fabriek
nikita.bio: Visionary entrepreneur passionate about transforming travel and productivity through AI innovation

slaff.position: Founder of R&D & Head of Product Development at Reclame Fabriek
slaff.achievement2: Expert in production systems and R&D
slaff.brand_intro: Worked with global brands on premium advertising display systems:
slaff.brand_context: Projects delivered through Reclame Fabriek (Daugavpils, LV), shared by both founders
slaff.philosophy: Technology should amplify human potential, not replace it. My goal is to build systems that empower people to achieve more.
slaff.algorhythmics_vision: Bringing enterprise-grade innovation experience and international brand work to build accessible, powerful AI products.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: AI-powered platforms transforming how people travel and work

nodevoyage.description: AI-powered travel planning with your intelligent companion Nodi. Create personalized itineraries, discover hidden gems, and travel with confidence using AR tools and offline capabilities.

ideonautix.description: Modular productivity super-suite for startups. Get AI-powered insights for pitches, revenue tracking, team dynamics, and more with intelligent microservices designed for founders.

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.subtitle: Building the future, one milestone at a time

nodevoyage.name: NodeVoyage
nodevoyage.hero_description: AI-powered travel planning that makes trip creation effortless, fun, and personalized. Meet Nodi, your intelligent travel companion.
nodevoyage.features_subtitle: Everything you need for the perfect journey

features.nodi-ai: Your friendly AI travel assistant that learns your preferences and creates personalized itineraries in seconds
features.smart-builder: Visual trip builder with drag-and-drop nodes, vibe presets, and real-time optimization
features.mobile-suite: AR translation, live interpretation, photo recognition, and full offline capabilities
features.community: Share your adventures, discover routes from travelers worldwide, and plan trips together

nodevoyage.step1_desc: Chat with Nodi AI about your travel preferences, budget, and interests
nodevoyage.step2_desc: Receive personalized itineraries with optimized routes and local insights
nodevoyage.step3_desc: Fine-tune your trip with our visual node-based builder
nodevoyage.step4_desc: Use mobile AR tools, offline maps, and real-time assistance on the go
nodevoyage.tech_subtitle: Google Cloud, AI, and modern web standards
nodevoyage.cta_title: Ready to Transform How You Travel?
nodevoyage.cta_description: Join our waitlist and be among the first to experience NodeVoyage when we launch in September 2026
nodevoyage.cta_note: No credit card required • Early access benefits

ideonautix.name: Ideonautix
ideonautix.hero_description: Modular productivity super-suite designed for startup founders and growing teams. AI-powered microservices that actually understand your business.
ideonautix.microservices_subtitle: Pick what you need, when you need it
ideonautix.pitch_desc: Get AI-powered feedback on your pitch deck with scoring, suggestions, and investor perspective analysis
ideonautix.revenue_desc: Real-time analytics dashboards with KPI tracking, forecasting, and actionable business insights
ideonautix.team_desc: Understand team health, communication patterns, and collaboration effectiveness with AI analysis
ideonautix.market_desc: Track competitors, market trends, and opportunities with AI-powered intelligence
ideonautix.finance_desc: Automated financial tracking, forecasting, and reporting for startups
ideonautix.growth_desc: Growth hacking tools and analytics to scale your startup faster
ideonautix.investor_desc: Manage investor relations, reporting, and communications in one place
ideonautix.analytics_desc: Comprehensive analytics hub combining all your business metrics
ideonautix.cta_description: Early access launching February 2026. Be part of shaping the future of startup productivity
